name: Celia's Chicken Adventure
description:
Hoy! It's time for Celia's Chicken Adventure, the adventure game where Celia has to make friends with all of the chickens. And she has to do it in 11 seconds! But they're all over the place! And there's 10 chickens! That's just over a second per chicken!

You can do it!  


-- Game & Controls -- 

Celia's Chicken Adventure is a single screen chicken-meeting game, created in Pico-8.

Press Z to start the chicken adventure

Directional Pad Up - Move up
Directional Pad Down - Move down
Directional Pad Left - Move left
Directional Pad Right - Move right

Meet all the chickens!


-- Note --

Sometimes a chicken will spawn on top of the player while on the main menu before the game starts, so you'll hear the chicken noise as soon as the game loads. This is what we call "easy mode", and it happens at random, and if it happens to you then just roll with it.


--Reviews--

"The Dark Souls of games where you make friends with all the chickens" - Bobu, 2021


--Dev notes--

This is the first thing I've ever coded so thank you for taking the time to play this! I used this fantastic tutorial series from bridgs as a starting point for it, which was amazing for someone who has no experience of making a game or writing any code for anything.  There's a menu screen, a play screen, a win and lose popup, and that's about it! The music is based on "Hakkeyoi", a song about sumo.
